events_upcoming_intro: Hackers, healers, farmers, founders‚Äîour gatherings mix them all. Come meet your future collaborators.
resources_subheading: From build logs to legal docs, this is our tool shed. Pop in often‚Äînew seeds sprout weekly.
volunteers_page_intro_text: Get your hands in the soil and your ideas in the mix. Pick a volunteer track that sparks joy.
volunteers_page_more_info: For more information check out our Pink Paper, Visitors Guide. We are excited to have you visit us soon!
resources_resources_heading: Put the kettle on and get to know us a little better
resources_resources_subheading: Read all about our dream: the mission, vision and how we got here, with our digital papers
resources_faq_subheading: Got a question? We're an open source.
stay_meta_description: Experience regenerative living at TDF, a place for collaboration and innovation.
stay_description: Come and stay in our regenerative village under development. Get a chance to learn about permaculture, bio-construction, web3 - or just come and relax surrounded by beautiful nature. We don't have 5 star facilities just yet, but you get to experience the magic of this place during its early years, and we guarantee you'll meet some inspiring humans you'll become friends with.
stay_meet_your_hosts_description: Come and stay in our regenerative village under development. Get a chance to learn about permaculture, bio-construction, web3 - or just come and relax surrounded by beautiful nature. We don't have 5 star facilities just yet, but you get to experience the magic of this place during its early years, and we guarantee you'll meet some inspiring humans you'll become friends with.
stay_chose_accommodation_description: From bringing your own van to staying in a shared dorm, we have a range of options to fit your needs. We recommend staying for 1 month to get the full experience of our community, but you can also come just for an event.
carrots_what_1: Trade carrots for lower stay costs.
carrots_what_4: Use 'em within a year‚Äîthese carrots do expire!
carrots_how_to_use_1: At checkout, apply your carrot stash if it fully covers lodging.
referrals_description_text_1: Share your unique link‚Äîwin-win rewards for both of you.
referrals_description_text_3: Max ü•ï 6 per month; resets on the 1st.
home_meta_description: Traditional Dream Factory‚ÄîPortugal's playground for regenerative living.
home_hero_title: Join our pioneering ecovillage in Portugal
home_hero_subtitle: Regenerative homes, startup studios, art labs‚Äîone sunny campus.
home_about_subtitle: Five hectares, Starlink cowork, glamping, pizza nights, sunset sauna. Suites, restaurant, and mushroom lab on the way.
home_land_development_body: 4‚ÄØ000+ trees are already rooting the soil, with 10‚ÄØ000 more fruit and nut trees‚Äîalmonds, olives, citrus, berries‚Äîon the blueprint. Contour swales capture rain, feeding our existing and planned lakes and keeping the land lush year‚Äëround. Our strictly organic methods rely on compost and natural pest control, turning excess biomass into biochar that locks away carbon while boosting fertility‚Äîso every harvest nourishes both the ecovillage and the planet.
home_about_sauna: Sauna, Agua Hara pool & outdoor cinema
home_coliving_building_14_suites_desc: 20 m¬≤ suites with desk, bath, queen bed‚Äîtailored for nomads, families, yogis, and conscious creators.
home_coliving_bioclimatic_buildings_desc: Passive solar, natural airflow, solar roof‚Äîcomfortable year-round and energy positive.
home_coliving_mixed_use_desc: Events three months a year; a thriving co-living village the other nine.
home_agroforestry_desc: We're planting 10 000 fruit trees, building lakes, and restoring soil with biochar.
home_agroforestry_water_retention_desc: Contour swales and two lakes keep the land lush year-round.
home_agroforestry_restorative_farming_de: No synthetics‚Äîjust compost, cover crops, and beneficial bugs.
home_agroforestry_biochar_desc: Excess biomass becomes biochar‚Äîlocking carbon and feeding trees.
home_agroforestry_scalability: A blueprint villages worldwide can copy.
home_meet_your_tribe: Meet your tribe of solarpunks, nomads, and soil lovers.
home_token_hero_subtitle: $TDF is your access key‚Äîstay credits, votes, and perks.
home_how_to_play_title: How to visit or dive in
home_how_to_play_desc_1: Drop in for a week, volunteer for a month, or craft a residency.
home_how_to_play_desc_2: Residents can level-up to full village membership.
home_how_to_play_volunteer_desc: Learn permaculture, bioconstruction, and community cooking.
home_how_to_play_resident_desc: Stay 1+ month, lead a project, and leave your mark.
home_movement_title: More than a co-living‚Äîjoin a land-regen movement
home_movement_desc_1: We're the first village in the OASA network‚Äîtransforming ownership into stewardship.
home_movement_desc_2: set forth by OASA. By accessing TDF lands, our members and visitors must abide by our regenerative ethos. OASA is on a bold mission to conserve 100.000 ha of land globally - and TDF is its first prototype in utilising real estate as a vehicle for ecological restoration.
home_token_access_title: Liquid access & governance, powered by the $TDF Token
home_token_access_tagline: Think of $TDF as a perpetual digital access right‚Äîsimple to buy, easy to hold.
home_token_access_desc: It turns guests into co-stewards and gives every holder a say in how the village grows.
home_token_bullet_1: Unlock space. Tokens open doors to suites, studios, and future villages.
home_token_bullet_2: Have a voice ‚Äî vote on development plans, executive team and community rules.
home_token_bullet_3: Share the upside. As the village earns, a slice funds land projects and stay credits for active members.
home_variant_1_title: Join our pioneering ecovillage in Portugal
home_variant_1_meta_description: Traditional Dream Factory (TDF) is a pioneering token enabled ecovillage in Abela, Portugal, stewarded by a collective of entrepreneurs & creators.
home_variant_1_hero_title: Join our pioneering ecovillage in Portugal
home_variant_1_hero_subtitle: We‚Äôre building a climate-resilient, technology powered ecovillage in Portugal‚Äîbecome an early stakeholder today.

home_variant_1_coliving_building_14_suit: Each 20 m¬≤+ suite boasts a desk, ensuite bath and queen bed‚Äîperfect for nomads, families, yogis and conscious creatives.

home_variant_1_agroforestry_biochar_desc: Turning surplus biomass into biochar boosts fertility, stores carbon and yields bonus renewable heat.
home_variant_1_agroforestry_scalability: Scalable blueprint: proving that profitable farming and ecological regeneration can thrive side-by-side.
home_variant_1_meet_your_tribe: Find your home, your practice, your people‚Äîcreatives, nomads, solarpunks, Web3 wizards and soil lovers unite.
home_variant_1_token_hero_subtitle: $TDF grants keys to housing and voice in village governance.
home_variant_1_how_to_play_desc_1: During construction we offer several pathways‚Äîshort stays, long residencies or skill-swap volunteering.
home_variant_1_how_to_play_desc_2: If sparks fly, you‚Äôll be invited to join as a full member‚Äîco-owning the village and shaping its future.

home_variant_1_how_to_play_guest_bullet_: Private or shared glamper / van spot
home_variant_1_how_to_play_volunteer_des: Trade 4 h/day of help for eco-skills and free digs.
home_variant_1_how_to_play_resident_desc: Pitch a project, stay a month+, build something lasting‚Äîand earn village equity.
home_variant_1_movement_desc_1: TDF is anchored in OASA‚Äôs vision of stewardship over ownership, guided by the
home_variant_1_movement_desc_2: OASA aims to conserve 100k ha worldwide‚ÄîTDF is prototype #1, turning real estate into ecological restoration.

home_variant_1_token_access_tagline: Think of $TDF as a never-expiring digital key‚Äîeasy to grab, effortless to keep.
home_variant_1_token_access_desc: It flips guests into co-stewards and lets every holder vote on how the village evolves.
home_variant_1_token_bullet_1: Unlock space ‚Äî tokens open doors to suites, studios, treehouses and more in our ecovillage.
home_variant_1_token_bullet_2: Have a voice ‚Äî vote on development plans, executive team and community rules.
home_variant_1_token_bullet_3: Share the upside ‚Äî tokens have a limited supply and can be resold after go-live.

playground_heading: We prototype a regenerative way of life.
playground_intro_1: Born from a crew of burners with dirt under their nails.
playground_intro_2: In 2024 we asked: what if the village were free to access?
playground_intro_3: Bring your gifts; co-create the new paradigm.
playground_intro_4: We aim to be a keystone species for planetary regeneration.

subscriptions_title: SUBSCRIBE TO THE PLACE YOUR HEART CALLS HOME
subscriptions_intro: Your monthly pledge does more than finance a dream‚Äîit makes you part of it. As a subscriber you co-create a regenerative village: planting trees, growing food, raising eco-homes and fueling spaces for bold ideas. Whether you start small or go all-in, every euro earns you stay credits, a voice in decisions, and a front-row seat to a future you helped build.
